summary.para: Lists values that specify navigation in the ASPxTreeList.
Disables page-mode navigation.

The ASPxTreeList automatically splits content (nodes) across multiple pages, and provides end-users with an embedded page navigation UI - Pager. The maximum number of nodes displayed on a page is specified by the property.
